ygData.subject: RE: Basic questions
ygData.msgSnippet: I think if you give it a slower weapon it will just stash it and keep its sword.
ygData.messageBody:
I think if you give it a slower weapon it will just stash it and keep its
sword.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tim Borelli [SMTP:timb@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, October 06, 1999 4:10 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Basic questions
>
> From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>
>
> most likely it wont do more damage, and get slowed down a lot... our pets
> are like MOBs, they hit for double (or 1.5) their level in damage, max,
> with no damage modifier (like SGs and others seem to have).
>
> Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, lazy 35th lvl enchanter on
> Cazic-Thule
>
>
> At 04:09 PM 10/6/99 -0500, you wrote:
> >From: "Dorris, Bob" <bob_dorris@...>
> >
> >What about 2h weapons? Has anyone tried to give that to a pet to do more
> >damage?
> >
> >Eriq
> >
>
> -------------------
> tim borrelli
> computer character animator
> "I dont suffer from insanity, I enjoy every minute of it..."
> Volition, Inc.
